students.description: Get help on how to use the bot, ex: `help`
Get the current status of the server, ex: `status`
Register yourself as a student, ex: `register <first_name> <last_name> <class_name>`
Mark yourself as present, an admin have to confirm before you got the point, ex: `present`

admins.description: Change the number of points given to students, ex: `change_points <points>`
Switch the server association state, from open to close and vice versa, ex: `switch`
Set the number of points of a given student, ex: `set_points <points> <discord_id>`
Export the list of students in a csv file, ex: `export`
